title.narrative: Youth Employment and Productive Inclusion Project

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to expand income-generating activities for youths in selected poor areas in Niger.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Employment, Work and Social Protection

condition.narrative: No later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall furnish the annual work plan and budget for the projectfor the first year of implementation

No later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, the Project Implementing Entity shall(a) have assigned or recruited anadditional accountant, satisfactory to the Association;(b) have customized its existing computerized accounting software, in amanner satisfactory to the Association to fit the Project accounting and reporting needs
No later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall have acquired, installed and customized a computerizedaccounting software, satisfactory to the Association
No later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, through MEWSP, the Recipient shall have hired an accountant, satisfactory tothe Association, for the Project
No later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, through MEWSP, the Recipient shall have hired an independent externalauditor, satisfactory to the Association
No later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, through MEWSP, the Recipient shall have hired an internal auditor,satisfactory to the Association, for the Project
